content:
UC IRVINE - ICS 125 PROJECT IN SYSTEM DESIGN

Assignment 5: Final

Due in final demo date ( Bring it to you final demo )

Assignment Requirements

This assignment consists of two parts: 1) an update to the Design document (see below) and 2) a final demonstration of your system. The demonstration schedule will be posted to the Newsgroup.

Purpose and Content

The Final Document is an update of the Design Document. Some of you have been asked to modify the architecture and project-specific diagrams from your last assignment. Please do so according to the specific feedback you received from the TAs.

All of you will need to update the test plans to include resutls.

Some of you will need to include user manuals (e.g., the Athletics Helper projects).

If you are in doubt about any details, ask your TA.

All team members should be present at the final demonstration.

Assignment Outline (see Assignment 4 for details)

  1. Title Page
  2. Summary
  3. Glossary
  4. Use Cases, Scenarios, Mock-up's
  5. Architecture Overview
  6. Modules Specification
  7. Team Specific diagrams
  8. Deliverables
  9. Delivery Platform
  10. Terms and Authorization
  11. Development Platform.
  12. Milestones and Effort

    Here you should list both your original estimations and what you really spent. You should also give an explanation for the difference.

  13. Acceptance Test Plan
  14. Unit and Integration Test Plans


    15. For each test, please add
    • Test Results
  15. User Manual (If required for your project -- See TA).

ICS125 WQ00 Assignments
ICS125 WQ00
David F. Redmiles Home Page
University of California, Irvine CA 92717-3425
